website_summaries.verdict: All-purpose knife works for hunting or camping tasks. Excellent handle for superior gripping, even when wet.
pros: Good length allows knife to do multiple jobs
Retains sharp edge for a long time
Blade includes blood groove and sawtooth back for versatility
cons: Sheath doesn't have high build quality
Handle size may be too thick for some people to hold properly

customer_reviews.title: Must read
customer_reviews.text: Awsome knife, amazing feel in hand fits perfectly in the stab,cut or slice positions. This knife has a great weight, and weight distribution. Has a great finger Guard, Varry durable easy to sharpen and clean I have had this knife for a year and haven't put any oil on it and the knife don't have any rust on it. The sheath is bulky but works nice and has a plastic piece inside the sheath so the knife don't cut through, extra pocket for a flashlight little knife or little first aid kit, got clamps to tighten around thigh, good stitching overall an amazing knife and at a beautiful price.
customer_reviews.author: Chad shilling

customer_reviews.title: The thigh strap is adjustable and clips easily together to keep it from flopping around when you’re ...
customer_reviews.text: Once again MTech has brought a high quality blade to the table and that’s not surprising considering that MTech has a solid background in blade craftsmanship. This knife is both thick and full tang as well as down right wicked looking. The sheath is nylon with an inner plastic blade guard to keep it from tearing up the sheath every time you draw it. The thigh strap is adjustable and clips easily together to keep it from flopping around when you’re knees to chesting it. It’s easy to draw and easy to clean and can easily be attached to any MOLLE webbing. You’re definitely gonna enjoy this knife I know I do.
customer_reviews.author: RogueWolf

customer_reviews.title: This knife itself isn't really all that useful for, well
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I'm one of those people who bought this because of CS:GO. But, this and the M9 Bayonet have actually inspired me to start my own knife collection, and now I also own 2 folding knives unrelated to CS:GO. This knife itself isn't really all that useful for, well, knife purposes. It looks great and feels nice in your hands, but as a knife its functions are fairly limited. If you're actually considering buying this knife to use it for purposes other than displaying it or just having it for the sake of having it, make sure that your purpose is for shanking some meaty flesh while hunting or something.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Park

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great SHTF purchase. Not designed for EDC (due to it's large size), unless your serving in Iraq. Blade length is a full 6" which makes it legally a Bowie knife and a permit would be needed to carry in Georgia. Comes w/ a drop down leg holster and leg straps. Also has extra compartment in front of leg sheath for acces. like a sharpening stone. Made in China (which i'm not wild about) but appears study, strong and durable. I like the gold colored blade which is a good offset to the black handle. Good weight, and balance to it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Home Safety + Practical Application = Winner of a Knife
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME, the only real application I have had for it is to cut up some old, super thick carpet. I never sharpened it since it arrived, and it cut right through it easily. The other reason I got it was just for safety in my home in the event anything goes down. Fortunately, I haven't had to use it but I can say this is definitely something that you can hurt someone with. Make sure to care that children cannot easily find and handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Alfaro

customer_reviews.title: Decent - Worth >$30
customer_reviews.text: Clearly a $30 knife. But I would have paid $40 or $50 for the quality after receiving and studying it, especially given the tracker design, with finger protection improvement. Handle edges are sharp and require some sanding to be comfortable, but due to other reviewers, I realized that in advance. I have not studied the quality of the sheath, though other posts highlighted what I deem unrealistic expectations for a $30 knife. My recommendation: Focus on the knife, not the accessories. You can buy another sheath for cost savings. Can't speak to the quality of the edge as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: M Tech is bea
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Mtech knifes have always been a favorite of mine. Has a good weight and the pre cut holes in the handle give a very comfortable grip. Down side of it is it's properly build as a combat knife. Not a survival one. Yes it could do both but with the weigh balance through the whole body it give better advantages in a fight
customer_reviews.author: Casey pelt

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This knife is outstanding! It has a thick grip that won’t slip, it comes super sharp out of the box, as all M-Tech’s do. The weight is good too. It feels great in your hand when cutting. The sheath, however, has one major design flaw-it doesn’t fit most adults. The bottom strap that is supposed to connect at the thighs...will not! I guess I can find a way to jury-rig the lashing so it will fit. I didn’t buy the knife for the sheath anyway. That’s just an added bonus. The heavy duty knife will last for generations to come.
customer_reviews.author: allnatural

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on a video game, Ghosts for those who are interested, and fell in love with it. Holds up well to tests and ended up buying two others I liked it so much. Will definitely keep this in the car for winter and camping.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great knife, ok sheath.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking knife but needs to be sharpened out of the box. Also I didn't like the sheath it came with. The "thigh strap" thing didn't fit around my let. And I'm pretty average size but apparently my legs be too dummy thicc for this one. Also no instructions for the different strings attached to it to explain what they do. Would have preferred a molle attachment system for my belt instead of the belt loop.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Goes through drywall smoother that a white boys fist
customer_reviews.text: I'm an electrician and got this knife to teach some dry wall jockeys a lesson after ripping up the wire in 70 lights and putting insulation in my respirator...that said it goes through drywall like butter!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife, just wish I could carry it with me.. lol
customer_reviews.text: This blade is BadAss! I wish I could just stop there... but I can't. I really like this knife because it is solid. Great weight to size ratio. I made a video about some MTech products, and I can very well say that you will not be disappointed. Very good knives.
customer_reviews.author: KevinReviewsStuff

customer_reviews.title: Scary Looking Blade
customer_reviews.text: This blade was just an impulse buy as the blade looked so awesome. It is something else in reality too. One bad thing the handle is set up for smaller hands. The finger groves squeezed my hand and I only have medium sized hands. It is a rugged build though. I actually think I might be able to saw something with this blade, or chop it maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Karasek

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this Knife itself is wonderful. Solid construction, durable blade and incredible handle. The only thing that keep this from being a 5 star is the sheath. Cheap sheath with a leg strap only big enough for a kid. Even with the crappy sheath, I would give it a 4.5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Viking

customer_reviews.title: Great job
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor knife, fits well in a larger hand. I also like the sheath. I would like a top of the blade (dull side, not sharp) to be serrated in a section for starting fires, that would really make this perfect. I knew it didn't have that when I ordered it though. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best $25 knife you'll ever own
customer_reviews.text: Got one of these around 7yrs ago & I've chopped down tree's with it split wood with it I mean I really everything you can think of & she's not only the longest relationship I've had I still keep it with me always. My son would not stop obsessing over how it felt in hand so for his birthday I got him this one for his 16th birthday
customer_reviews.author: Honest Trever

customer_reviews.title: ONE BAD ASS BLADE!
customer_reviews.text: ONE BADASS BLADE!!! this is the first time i've given ANY item on amazon a 5 star rating! as a patrol officer, i wanted a good, strong knife that i could wear on duty. this blade arrived VERY SHARP right out the box! the handle is strong and ergonomically sound. the sheath looks great too! my only beef is that the leg strap is TOO SMALL! did they intend this blade to be worn by a HOBBIT??? LOL! and NO! i'm not calling it "sting"! overall a great blade for under 50 bucks! delivery was on time. I WILL ABSOLUTELY BUY FROM THE SELLER AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: djsmoove24

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly didn’t read the description when I bought it. It does look small to me in the pic - like a regular knife that you buy at a random gas station. So when it arrived, imagine my surprise! I bought it because it looked cool and it was gold. It will be a gift for my sisters boyfriend and I think he will definitely love it. It looks sturdy and sharp, not loose at all. I love the thickness of it and the color. Didn’t arrive chipped or anything. Plus it arrived really fast!! I will definitely be buying one for my dad my dad next time.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Super Brutal
customer_reviews.text: This knife looks really awesome! Also its brutal look would be inhumane if used in self defense, it would cause too much pain. Awesome for my collection but not so useful for say carving some wood. But totally great for showing off!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Insane quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten so many compliments on this knife. "Hey that's the knife from Call of Duty Ghosts!" "I would totally trust my life with this." "This makes me feel like a man." The handle is a bit sharp on the edges and give me small blisters when holding it, would recommend wrapping cord on the handle for that. Very sharp, thin, but sturdy enough to where I don't think it'll ever break. Only problem is I have only used it a few times and I already have a couple small nicks on it, that made the black on the blade turn silver a bit, really not a problem at all though.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson America

customer_reviews.title: Very nice knife
customer_reviews.text: Order received in just 24 hours after being placed on a Saturday afternoon. the knife is very solid, full tang, sharp, and thick. I have a feeling this is going to be one of my favorite knives. My ONLY complaint would be that the leg strap for the sheath does not fit around my large leg even with the strap fully extended. it also sets relatively high on my leg but that is because the blade is not the length of a bowie. This knife can even split saplings. The sheath even comes with a pocket large enough for a sharpening stone or a folding knife.
customer_reviews.author: BigStik

customer_reviews.title: It’s solid.
customer_reviews.text: Iv bought at least 20-30 varieties of blades from them and iv only been totally disappointed twice. Once because I didn’t read into the measurements so that was on me and once I bought a assisted folder that the blade lock broke on after a few weeks. I’d say over all there reputation is solid with me. You get what you pay for with steal weather it’s cuts or goes bang. But more often than not I get more than what I expected from there products.
customer_reviews.author: “TheDirtyDipper” ClaytonDavidHowellSonnier

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy knife for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice, and secure in your hand. the grips are a little sharp but would be wearing gloves if using anyways. sheath is hard plastic lined as well. fits my leatherman in the front pocket
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife, Not so good sheath.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing blade. Sharp on arrival and has a nice weight to it. Tried out the sheath and the damn button broke the first time I unbuttoned it. Also the protective plastic in the sheath that was glued together, was falling apart because of the lack of glue. I just reglued it with basic elmer's glue and its good now. 5/5 for the Knife itself, 3/5 for the sheath so I'll go in between and go for 4/5 :)
customer_reviews.author: Markus Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: MUST PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT knife for the price. I like everything about it. It came really sharp. Decent sheath. Extra pouch on the sheath for sharpener stone, flashlight etc. I like the overall weight. Seems really tough.
customer_reviews.author: Randall ballenger

customer_reviews.title: Terrible delivery service
customer_reviews.text: Product is everything you would expect sharp heavy very sturdy. However the leg strap will only fit around someone that weighs about 85 lbs...also the amazon delivery people need to do a better job at finding the correct house they sent it to the wrong house twice, the first time it was stolen or either my neighbors are playing dumb and the second time I caught it before it was stolen again...needless to say someone is walking around with an 11 inch knife and hopefully they are stable enough to not do anything stupid with it.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great knife for the money. Bought it for backpacking and zombies. I can baton with it or slice with precision. Edge comes rather dull. I had a friend sharpen it to a razor's edge for me (I can literally shave with it) It has kept the edge for a few months now with light to moderate use. The handle is going to be either superb for you or terrible, it fits a larger hand really well. The finger grooves are more uncomfortable for smaller hands. The back of the blade is pretty useless, the pictures show a serrated edge. Those teeth aren't sharpened and are mostly for show. Sheath has a small pocket, perfect for my flint and steel.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, well made, extremely sharp knife.
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp, well made knife...unfortunately it looks nothing like the picture, so it is being returned. The "gold" is all washed out and the "black" handle is gray. It almost looks like someone bought a new knife and returned their old faded one.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowdancer2018

customer_reviews.title: great knife this is my third one
customer_reviews.text: i am a camper that loves the outdoors i used this knife a lot and other love them so i sell it to them is the only reason i keep buying lol
customer_reviews.author: Dave U

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price, but that handle...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit more decorative than usefull. Blade was pretty dull. That handle does not work with my hand, to many protrusions. Still, for the price I think I can work around it's shortcomings.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best knife I’ve owned. I like it even more than my $130 benchmade. The blade feels strong and durable while the handle sits perfectly in your hand. It also has a nice weight to it. My only issue is the sheath, it feels cheep. It sits on my belt comfortably but I already cut a hole in the tip just from normal use. Also the leg strap is tiny. Even fully loosened I can’t get that thing to go around my thigh.
customer_reviews.author: M + A

customer_reviews.title: Great knife crappy sawback
customer_reviews.text: This knife is solid and has weight to it. It's great for chopping small bits of wood and works great to baton wood. The sawback is garbage. Not sure what I would use it for-maybe to saw small branches in half that I could easily snap? I bought this knife for the sawback so I am definitely disappointed but still 4 stars because it is one solid knife.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good Looks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this solely on looks. It sits on a cabinet in my house. The steel doesn't seems the best, and I haven't done too much cutting with it aside from a couple tests. Like I said, not my ideal type of carry knife for any situation really, but the looks are cool, and it was worth the price at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Marius Monnig

customer_reviews.title: The only improvment I would see would be better shethes and leather
customer_reviews.text: It seems some have dissed MTech knives as being cheep , and I have to agree they are compared to some others out there .... But in my experience with five of them they are worth every cent . They are well made and can be sharpened to a razor edge . The only improvment I would see would be better shethes and leather . The MX-8050 feels well balanced and well made weather in gold finish or black steel . Guranteed to kill Zoombies
customer_reviews.author: Ole Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome well made and very Tactical
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my brother, really loves it, nice and sharp, handle is alright, hard to find the spot for the pointer finger, maybe hands are too small lol, but overall love it regardless. got myself one too.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cazares

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: I went on a spur of the moment camping trip with my brother and some friends last night and figured that it would be an ideal opportunity to test out the knife. Needless to say, it handled every task it was given. I managed to hack some decently sized branches down and process them into firewood. I wouldn’t say it was easy, but the knife still got the job done. The sheath comes with a little pocket (which I use to keep a small whetstone and a lighter in), that ultimately came in handy. Overall, I’m gonna give the knife two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Best blade for the price.. this knife is a beast
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and can handle many tasks.. handle takes a bit to get used to but what a great deal for the price it’s an awesome knife
customer_reviews.author: XZellenZ

customer_reviews.title: A canvas holster, for a knife not the brightest idea ever.
customer_reviews.text: The life itself is OK it was it for about a week before the knife worked its way through the holster, it cut through the holster now the knife sits in the nightstand drawer unused
customer_reviews.author: Earth man

customer_reviews.title: Great for everything!
customer_reviews.text: Such a perfect knife for both hunting and self defense if needed. Knife arrived within two days and was quite a speedy service. My only issue is with the sheath. I'm kind of a small person, and the sheath's clips doesn't allow for me to make it small enough that it fits my leg. It seems like it was catered to a normal, full sized male.
customer_reviews.author: Reddington

customer_reviews.title: Value for your dollar
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing that you can get this level of quality at such a low price. I was skeptical because of the low price but I have had other knives made in China that were good quality. You just have to shop carefully. When this one arrived I was pleasantly surprised at the high quality of the materials and workmanship of the knife. Of course I did my research before I bought this gem. I have seen videos on Youtube of this knife chopping and batoning as well as slicing and piercing. All very impressive. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this knife to anyone interested in a quality tactical/survival knife at a budget price.
customer_reviews.author: jim johnson

customer_reviews.title: MTech USA Xtreme MX-8054 Tactical Fixed Blade Knife = Great Knife!!!
customer_reviews.text: This MTech Tactical Fixed Blade Knife is a great deal! Heavy duty and well constructed, as well as a great design for a Tactical Fighter. Quality, heavy steel, full tang design and a solid contoured handle is what you want in a good tactical blade. There's an abundance of great reviews already written, so I won't burn up your time with my song, other that to say, "Great Knife, Great Price and Great Service from Amazon". Buy this bad boy...you won't be disappointed. I'm about to buy two more, for my son and nephew. Thank You, MTech and Thank You, Amazon! I love this knife as much as my K-Bar! (Yes, I'm ex-military and a two tour 'Nam Vet).
customer_reviews.author: David R. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: feels good in both grip and weight
customer_reviews.text: The blade is well made, feels good in both grip and weight. This is a wonderful full tang blade that has many YouTube reviews showing its practicality. The sheath has some poor stitching though, and we we're required to re-sew several areas including the belt loop. The leg wrap also is far to small for almost any adult we've tried to tie it around. Honestly as this is a weapon that I carry on me daily the sheath is the only draw back, I truly wish the company would have maintained the same production level across the board.
customer_reviews.author: Tolona

customer_reviews.title: The short version
customer_reviews.text: Summary; fun/beautiful knife. Good weight behind it. Blade adequately sharp. Looks Menacing. Cons; Handle is made for a specific hand size- bigger than mine, forces thumb to be on back of blade. Weird ridges on back serve little purpose. Sheathe has leg strap, but it is meant for people with small or medium thighs.
customer_reviews.author: D Hern

customer_reviews.title: adequare
customer_reviews.text: It's a good knife. I think I will keep it for my actual camping trips. It is large enough to do small camping works like cutting smaller wood pieces for campfire etc. And it is small enough if you want to carry it around for backpacking. But I am going to buy a smaller knife for backpacking because it is a bit bigger for the usual usage of a backpacking knife.
customer_reviews.author: knee'nad

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Took all the reviews in and improved the knife beyond purchase. Sharpend the blade so sharp it slices a piece of paper easily, sharpend the serrated teeth so that both edges are sharp enough to chew wood, removed the crappy plastic handles and Ranger weaved 550 cord onto it. Cosmetically it looks like a premier knife and utility wise it is performing for what I use it for, thus taking into consideration that other comments said the metal is crap, hoping I got a good one out of the bunch.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This knife is awesome! Glad I bought it. Love the grip. Have not had it long enough to test durability. It feels solid and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Not functional. Only for show
customer_reviews.text: Know comes with barely an edge. NOT sharp at all. "Saw tooth" is not functional at all: way too wide and flat to cut anything. Finishing has some light scratches. But the metal quality seems to be decent so I'll sharpen it and make do.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Built well
customer_reviews.text: Everything they said it is. My question is how do I sharpen it when I need to ? I don't want to use a stone.
customer_reviews.author: franklin

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for the price
customer_reviews.text: While it would have been nice for this to be made with T10 steel or 1045, the price is fitting for a stainless steel blade. It appears to have good weight, and can definitely chop smaller, less rigid items with force alone. However, the blade ships very dull. I would recommend a moderate angle sharpening, followed by a fine sharpening. Overall, for the price, it appears to be a decent tactical, camping knife. However, this would not do well against harder steel in a fight.
customer_reviews.author: Jza444

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and love the knife would of got the gold color if i could go back but happy w black Very durable
customer_reviews.author: Caleb J Rogers

customer_reviews.title: MTech USA Xtreme
customer_reviews.text: very nice knife it fit nicely in my hand and I have large hands. a little weighty the blade sharpened to a nice edge..overall nice buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mark V Carter

customer_reviews.title: nice design and very sharp tanto black blade
customer_reviews.text: nice design and very sharp tanto black blade. very strong blade, heavy enough for tactical use or tool.. I must say something, the handle is a bit sharp and does not fits into my hand profile. many people have complain about this issue and got it fixed with a file. you can mold the grip using a file and no one will notice have been modified because the material is soft to be sanded. I have been using this knife to cut liner base for gravel and garden. also for 1 inch branches.
customer_reviews.author: Opaz

customer_reviews.title: Thank you MTech, I love the knife!
customer_reviews.text: First off I bought it from the default "Unlimited Wares" seller to verify where I bought it from, and regardless of what some of the other reviews said this knife is darn near amazing. It comes standard with the sheath and a mildly flimsy plastic insert for the sheath, the blade came sharp(I shaved a long line on my arm) and the straps are adjustable for a variable amount of slack to hold to knife in place, the leg straps and strings are not paracord but can be easily changed out and modified for better comfort and ease of use. BUY IT!! IT'S WORTH THE MONEY THEY ARE OFFERING IT FOR!
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Useful...but ???
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim thinking it might be a trendy looking all around knife. It is...but I'm sure there is better for your money. Don't take this wrong, it's a nice knife....it's just sorta .. meh !!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Quite bulky but comfortable. Before this knife I had only ever had ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly sharp knife with a stylish sheath that goes on your outer thigh. Quite bulky but comfortable. Before this knife I had only ever had pocket knives that were nowhere near the size of this one but I find it to be a very good knife well worth the money. It fits very comfortably in the hand and thankfully isn't made of a cheap material. It is a very sturdy knife made of quality stainless steel. Highly recommend this knife to anyone looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Childs

customer_reviews.title: Love the knife
customer_reviews.text: Love the knife, hate the sheath. The knife is forged from a quarter inch steel piece and is full tang. Probably the strongest knife I've ever owned. The sheath is terrible, no way to mount it to anything except you're belt and it's large and bulky. I had to make another that is now MOLLE compatible. For you gamers out there, this is the exact same combat knife as in Call of Duty Ghosts.
customer_reviews.author: Firestar

customer_reviews.title: Tough and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and sturdy knife for the price. I gave mine to my cousin as a gift for house sitting and I miss that knife! I saw that tops knives are coming out with one later this year that looks a lot like this knife. Check prepared mind 101 shot show 2015 tops. U will see it, and I guarantee it'll be at least three times the price of this knife. I'm not bad mouthing tops knives. They are quality! But this knife seems very sturdy and very affordable. Wish I had used it more before giving it away. Oh well. I can afford to get another. Hope this helped.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Powell III

customer_reviews.title: I love this knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife, the leg strap as everyone mentioned is way too small for anyone unless they have anorexia. Cut it off and use paracord and a toggle instead. Stropped it passes the paper test without any issues!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Clarke

customer_reviews.title: BEST buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best buy of all the knives in it's class on Amazon, solid, razor sharp, great ergonomics, well balanced and the sheath is ready for conceal carry. A little edgy around the grip...something a little sanding block and fix in seconds to create a smooth but sure grip.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Brett Savage

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Husband liked the knife originally bought it for him as a hunting knife which the internet said it was the best but it’s more of a tactical knife.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty and great to keep next to your bed in case of intruders
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and feel of this
customer_reviews.text: My favorite knife now. This is badass. Very sharp, though some more experienced folks may choose to want to sharpen it even further if they want to shave with it. ;) feels solid and constructed well. Powdercoating, finish and blade are all clean. G10 handles are attached via hex screws. I have seen other recommendations to add a drop of crazy glue to keep them from loosening. I only wish this design came in a matching Bowie or machete size. I recommend the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Riddle631

customer_reviews.title: Awesome daily user
customer_reviews.text: Ya can't go wrong with mtech. Durability plus decent pricing make it a steal.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: So sharp in my cut through the sheath so be extremely careful when pulling out this knife
customer_reviews.text: This blade is probably the most biggest sharpest is blade I have I mean I love the grip of it the details on this baby is cool heavy duty for sure
customer_reviews.author: brittany cedeno

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: The handle is the coolest part. It’s well made and has some weight to it
customer_reviews.author: Bchan

customer_reviews.title: “Heavy” Combat duty ready for war! Even at 440ss
customer_reviews.text: This is a big boy knife. I’d take this into a combat situation easily. I favor heavier weapons Aj the weight is spot on for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shihanjallen39

customer_reviews.title: awesome knife. feels like a well made high quality ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome knife. feels like a well made high quality blade with a thick full tang. that being said, it is still a Chinese knife. the tanto edge wasnt too sharp, but thats an easy fix. the sheath is garbage, will be making a kydex sheath for the knife and tossing the cheap nylon sheath. All in all though, its a great knife for the affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bloodworth

customer_reviews.title: Even more beautiful in person
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a BEAST! Even more beautiful in person. It came very sharp, well protected in its package and in perfect condition. The serrated edge is crazy sharp. Full tang. Finger grips on the handle make for the perfect hold. Sheath is sturdy; has ties for attaching it to your leg, one leg strap, and a belt loop. Very happy to be adding this one to my collection!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and durable blade! The sheath has a leg strap and a pocket for a sharpening stone. Its definitely "Rambo" worthy 👍
customer_reviews.author: Armando P.

customer_reviews.title: Strong sturdy knife. Comes pretty sharp
customer_reviews.text: Strong sturdy knife. Comes pretty sharp. I felt slightly mislead by the product name and write up regarding where it's made. I was under the impression it's was made in USA. It's not, made in China. Regardless it seems to be a good design and build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Roddy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Knife !
customer_reviews.text: Great Knife for Your collection ! Looks very Good !
customer_reviews.author: Ron J.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the poor reviews. When you buy this you're paying for the knife not the sheath. I will admit, the sheath is a bit over elaborate for the knife, but it does fit. One small complaint about the knife is that the groove on the curve of the knife does not go to the center of the curve on both sides. It's uneven, but it is a minor complaint. Overall it is the best knife I have owned. Comfortable, slim, and sexy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall I would say I'm pretty happy with the knife. The full tang along with the thick blade makes it feel sturdy. It's fairly sharp out of the box ( not razor sharp or even gerber sharp, but with the right amount of sharpening it can be accomplished) the sheith is horrible, the third time I pulled it out the kidex wannabe stuff came out with it, so if you get the knife might want to look into making your own sheith. I originally got this knife just to say I have a cool lookin knife, but after playing around with it for a few months it just might become my hunting knife (lots of sharpening)
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Hamernik

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Have taken time trying to beat this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Have taken time trying to beat this up and it's strong. Use it for hunting and camping. It works for everything. A bit large for my tiny hands but perfect for my husband. Full tang. Nice canvas sheath.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for son, he loves the look and feel of this knife! Good quality and strength!
customer_reviews.author: gail ~ h

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife. I love the look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knife. I love the look and feel. One of the best ergonomic designs I've seen in a while. Incredibly sturdy, full, tang construction. In my experience Mtech has the cheapest knives around that still don't skimp on quality.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: So bad ass. Showed my friends and they thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: So bad ass. Showed my friends and they thought it was nuts. It chops wood and batons fine. Mine was very sharp out of the box. So dope I bought 2
customer_reviews.author: Charliemac10

customer_reviews.title: pretty good knife for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool knife, the metal is so so, but for $30.00 you can't complain. It's pretty strong, the coating is alright, it has a few marks on it from light use. But I'd get another :) It's a good knife to own.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great knife but hard to sharpen every curve.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this knife. ...except that it is a pain in the neck to try to sharpen.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Love it's pattern and it's sharp.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and handle fits nicely in my average shape hands. The weight is neutral handle to blade. Overall weight feels light. Blade came nicely sharpened. My knife sharpening guy said he's seen the same knife a lot. I don't use it for any heavy work. I really like it's form/look.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: mtech xtreme
customer_reviews.text: mtech xtreme feels like a good knife for the price. it feels sturdy and has a good feel to it. the only reason i did not rate 5 is because the top part that looks like a saw to saw a tree branch or something is completely useless. Overall it looks sharp out of the box but would recommend to sharpen it yourself to get it really sharp and maybe if your good enough you can sharpen the saw part of it
customer_reviews.author: javier

customer_reviews.title: Bought for boyfriend who is ex military and pretty particular. Let him have a look at it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for boyfriend who is ex military and pretty particular. Let him have a look at it before I put it away for xmas. The sheath and leg straps fit perfectly. He is about 6 feet and 170 lbs. Beautiful product
customer_reviews.author: Kirsty

customer_reviews.title: Feels good in the hand with a good weight to it
customer_reviews.text: Have not been impressed with some MTech knives, but I will probably buy another one of these. Feels good in the hand with a good weight to it. Seems pretty sharp, though that is not that big a concern. I'd rather receive a good knife I need to put a better edge on than a junk knife that's sharp out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: samhain

customer_reviews.title: Slice and dice
customer_reviews.text: The knife itself was great. Sharp and weighty. The sheath was good but if you got thicker thighs, you'll have to use the strings to keep it closer to your leg. That clip ain't long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Sniegowski

customer_reviews.title: Tacky knife? Yes. Quality product? Also yes.
customer_reviews.text: The black part is some sort of plastic or composite, so it is not a comfortable grip, but the knife is decent. The blade is thick and full-tang so it so far seems very durable and more than usable.
customer_reviews.author: Grawlix

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted, good quality for the price, I bought another one a year ago but gave away to a friend who loved it, keeping this one!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Shark

customer_reviews.title: MTECH Xtreme Knife
customer_reviews.text: Can't help but love this knife. It arrived a week ahead of schedule with Amazon Super Saver Shipping and was better than I expected. Out of box it's sharp and just looks great. It breathes quality from the thick and beautifuly finished blade to the black, textured wood handle. The finger grooves can't help but give you a good grip and the blades shape is built to withstand hacking and abuse. An all around great camping, hiking, bear killing blade.
customer_reviews.author: Ging

customer_reviews.title: Battle ready indeed.
customer_reviews.text: The MTECH company is not 100% American, but i love this blade, it is truly one of a kind, it is formed after the blade from the best selling video game Call of duty: Ghost. This blade comes with a case you can carry around your side alone with a strap that may fit around you leg as well, it is made out of strong fibers and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: THIGH SHEATH STRAP MADE 4 LITTLE CHINA MAN!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sheath strap below belt for your leg is really short. Wouldnt wrap around my thigh. I'm 5'9", 165lbs, avg. build. Overall, pretty sweet knife for the price. Very sharp out of the box. Great bug out bag medium duty camp knife.
customer_reviews.author: Ross X

customer_reviews.title: Sick Knife, not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a great looking knife, then this is it. If you want to have something you want to use daily, or even weekly... maybe even twice a month, probably skip this knife and look for something of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Holt Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife.
customer_reviews.text: Very very amazied on how great this knife looks and feels in my hand, this product is great for the out doors or cutting your way through netting or large boxes. Only Wish I have is if it could be just a little sharper but that's just me. Over all Great knife.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Allen

customer_reviews.title: I love this knife so much this is the second one ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife so much this is the second one I bought This goes on my bug out bag and I carry my first one with me as an EDC
customer_reviews.author: Malice

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: this is a great knife ...needs to sharpened but no big deal..nice and heavy...if you have big hands ..this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: rodney edwards

customer_reviews.title: Cool knife small scratch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice knife heavier than I thought it would be. The grips are made of aluminum. They fit in you hand comfortably overall very cool knife. I received mine with a scratch on the paint on the blade but not to noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: vary sturdy, hold an edge decently and solidly constructed i use mine to clean big game and it has not let me down yet
customer_reviews.author: carmelo

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Most impressive knife I've ever had. Extremely well made, the price for such an item is unbelievably low. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, and a great quality product. Easy 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built knife
customer_reviews.text: Knife seems solid. Sharp enough. Sheath is mediocre. But should serve the prupose .
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Harms

customer_reviews.title: ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄
customer_reviews.text: Let's be honest. I'm not using this for camping or batoning. I have my Becker for that. But I'm an avid csgo player and I've got a Vanilla Huntsman knife in game. I love the design. Super comfortable grip. I'd imagine it would get painful if you used it for things other than combat (like batoning) but if you're gonna cut someone up then you won't be dropping it. Please don't go cutting people up. Quality is questionable. I bet it'd break on me if I used it for chopping and stuff. For $30 and made in China, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I have this knife four stars because the knife wasn't sharp on arrival, I had to sharpen it on my own which kinda sucked but, it's well crafted. Not too bad on the weight scale. Very well balanced, sturdy knife. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Cole

product_meta.title: MTech USA Xtreme
feature_bullets: Tactical fixed blade knife ideal for camping expeditions or survival training
G10 handle offers a superior grip in even the wettest of conditions
Includes black nylon sheath for easy and safe carry
11-inch overall length, 5-1/2-inch blade length with 5.5mm thickness
